usage: Campaign execution plans and optimization phases

dataMapping.title: Bid Optimization Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Simulated bidding strategy implementation and optimization phases
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary bidding objective (e.g., 'Achieve 5.0x ROAS through optimized bidding strategies')

phases.primaryLabel: Bidding phase (e.g., 'Baseline Simulation', 'Aggressive Bidding Test', 'Conservative Optimization')
phases.description: Phase bidding strategy and simulation parameters
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected bidding performance and ROAS projections
phases.budget: Phase budget allocation (e.g., '$500K', '25% of total budget')

milestones.milestoneLabel: Bidding milestone (e.g., 'Simulation Model Validated', 'Target ROAS Achieved')

dependencies: Bidding dependencies (e.g., 'Historical bid data processed', 'Market conditions analyzed')

successMetrics: Bidding success metrics (e.g., '5.0x ROAS target', '70% win rate', 'CPC reduction of 15%')
riskFactors: Bidding risks (e.g., 'Market competition increase', 'Budget constraints', 'Algorithm changes')
